title: [Large-Scale] Language Team Project Competency Enhancement Program Through Collaborative Learning Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency, team project experience, and intermediate-level language expression skills (grammar and vocabulary application)
context.additional_context: Operated as PBL, this course monitors and improves team linguistic dynamics through real-time collaborative learning data analysis using digital tools. Focuses on text/conversation analysis during language-integrated projects.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze collaborative learning log data to evaluate individual linguistic contributions (discussion participation, lexical diversity, etc.) within a team with 80% accuracy.
Learners can reflect on their communication patterns (speaking/listening strategies, feedback expressions, etc.) based on analysis results and develop a language expression improvement plan.
Learners can improve verbal collaboration efficiency (communication clarity, discussion structuring, etc.) by over 25% through at least three data-driven feedback sessions during a team project.

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
